subject: Your E-mail-Address was select

subject: Re: Your E-mail-Address was select
body:
Hello there,

Wow, this sounds like an amazing opportunity! I can't believe my luck. Could you please tell me more about this Annual American Mega Millions Lottery? How was I selected and what does it mean to have a total value of USD?

I'm also curious about the program attorney. What will their role be in this process? And how will they handle the cost of transfer?

Looking forward to hearing more about this exciting news!

Please note that for security reasons, I won't be able to provide a copy of my identity at this time.

Thank you!

Best wishes,
Michelle
